item.description:
If you have never been tubing you have to try this - it is like a roller coaster in the snow and Amesbury is one of the best in the area.  The snow is well groomed and the location is easy to find - it IS a ride but the ride is worth it.

We will meet at the park,. spend a morning tubing, hopefully have plenty of hot beverages, and then can head out for lunch - or not.

A 3-hour pass is $24 and a 5-hour pass is $30.

If we have 30 attendees we get a discount!  Find some friends!

We are looking for an assistant organizer for this event - let me know if you are interested in helping - it is easy to help.

 

 

http://www.amesburysportspark.net/

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Let's go tubing - dress warm!
